citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:00 PM on 9/4/25.
The inspector arrived at 12:00 PM on 9/4/25 to conduct an inspection. The Licensee was just leaving the facility for an
appointment at an off-site location and would not return until later that afternoon. An AWA compliance inspection could
not be conducted because there was no other authorized facility representative available to accompany the inspector.
This is the FIRST attempted inspection of the Licensee. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for
inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:00 PM on 9/4/25.  
 
The inspector arrived at 12:00 PM on 9/4/25 to conduct an inspection. The Licensee was just leaving the facility for an 
appointment at an off-site location and would not return until later that afternoon. An AWA compliance inspection could 
not be conducted because there was no other authorized facility representative available to accompany the inspector.  
 
This is the FIRST attempted inspection of the Licensee. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for 
inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
